com.undead_pixels.dungeon_bots.script.proxy

Class LuaReflection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.undead_pixels.dungeon_bots.script.proxy.LuaReflection

  • public class LuaReflection
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    2/1/2018 Class containing static methods that handle many common reflection related operations
    used for retrieving annotated methods and fields for creating Lua code that can invoke java methods
    Author:
    Stewart Charles

      • genId

        public static java.lang.String genId(java.lang.Object o,
                                     java.lang.reflect.Member m)
        Generates a unique String ID for the Member of the source Object
        Parameters:
        o - An object, can be null for static Members
        m - A member (Field or Method)
        Returns:
        A String ID that specifically refers to the member of the specific object

      • getBindableMethods

        public static java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.reflect.Method> getBindableMethods(java.lang.Object o)
        Returns a collection of Bindable methods found for the argument object. A Bindable method is any method that has been tagged with the @Bind annotation.
        Parameters:
        o - The Object to get all Bindable methods of
        Returns:
        A Stream of the Objects Bindable Methods

      • getBindableStaticMethods

        Parameters:
        c - The Class to collect Bindable methods for
        Returns:
        A Stream of Methods

      • getMethodWithName

        public static java.util.Optional<java.lang.reflect.Method> getMethodWithName(java.lang.Object o,

        Finds and possibly returns the first instance of a method beonging to the
        target object that has the specified name.
        Parameters:

        name - The name of the method to find
        Returns:
